channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA Jetson TX2 series, TX2 NX
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA Jetson TX2 series, TX2 NX

item.title: CVE-2021-34396|2024-08-04T00:12:50.016Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20jetson%20tx2%20series%2C%20tx2%20nx
item.description: Bootloader contains a vulnerability in access permission settings where unauthorized software may be able to overwrite NVIDIA MB2 code, which would result in limited denial of service.
